memberdef.name: ui_ops
memberdef.initializer: = { notify_added, NULL, request_add, finch_request_authorize, finch_request_close, NULL, NULL, NULL, NULL }

detaileddescription.para: Show the edit dialog for an account.

parameterdescription.para: The account to edit, or NULL to create a new account.
